Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: Hello World

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: GitHub
Post._content:
# GIT
## 
    git config --global user.name "Firstname Lastname"
    git config --global user.email "your_email@example.com"
    less ~/.gitconfig #
## macssh key
<https://www.jianshu.com/p/32b0f8f9ca8e>

    1.check ~/.ssh/id_rsa~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
    2.ssh -keygen -t rsa -C"your_email"
    # strout
    Generating public/private rsa key pair.
    Enter file in which to save the key (/Users/zhaohuanan/.ssh/id_rsa):
    # 
    /Users/zhaohuanan/.ssh/id_rsa already exists.
    Overwrite (y/n)?
    # 
    # stdout
    Your identification has been saved in /Users/zhaohuanan/.ssh/id_rsa.
    Your public key has been saved in /Users/zhaohuanan/.ssh/id_rsa.pub.
    The key fingerprint is:
    SHA256:kVZgG0pDKf1DD50nbkZPAmvJXQnH12CS0/rDjjbOJMM hermanzhaozzzz@gmail.com
    The key's randomart image is:
## githubssh keys
id_rsaid_rsa.pubGIthub
cat.pub SSH Keys
 Add SSH Key  Title  Key  id_rsa.pub 
 GitHub  

    ssh -T git@github.com
    The authenticity of host 'github.com (13.229.188.59)' can't be established.
    RSA key fingerprint is SHA256:nThbg6kXUpJWGl7E1IGOCspRomTxdCARLviKw6E5SY8.
    Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)? yes
    # 
    # sshknowhosts~/.ssh/known_hosts ip
    Warning: Permanently added 'github.com,13.229.188.59' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
    Hi hermanzhaozzzz! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
## GitHub
    git clone http://github/common.git
    # github  clone  push  GitHub 
## git
### git init
Git

     mkdir git-tutorial
     cd git-tutorial
     git init
     .gitgit
    
### git add
    git add README.md #gitchanges to be committed
    git status
### git commit


    git commit -m "First commit"[] First commit
### git remote add origin http://....
github
### git push -u origin master
master
## Githubblog
### node.js
HexoNode.js,[](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)npmNode.jsnode -v

    node -v
    npm -v #
### Hexo
HexoHexo

    npm install -g hexo-cli
    #cnpm
    hexo init blog
    #
    hexo new test_my_site
    hexo g
    hexo s
    #localhost4000

### 

    npm install hexo -g #Hexo
    npm update hexo -g #
    hexo init #
    hexo s #**hexo sever**
    hexo d #**hexo deploy**
    hexo server #Hexo
    hexo server -s #
    hexo server -p 5000 #
    hexo server -i 192.168.1.1 # IP
    hexo clean #

  ### 
```dot
diagraph G{
  ->A
  A->B
  B->D
  B->C
  C->
}
```
![website](hexo.png)

themes_config.yml

HexoGitHub_config.yml

    deploy:
    type: git
    repo: GitHub .git

    npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
    hexo clean
    hexo g  
    hexo d
githubGithub Page

### 
Hexo[Themes](https://hexo.io/themes/) NextblogthemesNextblogblog

    git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
Nextblogthemesnext****_config.ymlnext

_config.ymlScheme Settings

nextPisces##hexo ghexo d
### 
    hexo n ""
blogsource_post .md Markdown

Markdown hexo s --debug localhost:4000 hexo ghexo d 
### 
source Markdown***! [  ] ()*** 

[](https://www.qiniu.com/) .
### 
* 
*
